  • Description: X-2024010759 SequenceEvent: Package located during the sort leaking. DescribePack: Loose cap allowed liquid contents to escape. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package separated from sort and placed in hazardous materials tub. X-2024010773-SequenceEvent: Packaging noticed wet during sortation. DescribePack: Loose cap allowed package contents to leak DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package separated from sortation and placed in hazmat tub.
